title: Clarity update for function doc string
body_html: In the function class, the doc string previously said that each function should be used only once in the forward pass. This was ambiguous as to whether it referred to the function itself or each instantiation of the function. To make this less ambiguous the word object was added
body_text: In the function class, the doc string previously said that each function should be used only once in the forward pass. This was ambiguous as to whether it referred to the function itself or each instantiation of the function. To make this less ambiguous the word object was added
body: In the function class, the doc string previously said that each function should be used only once in the forward pass. This was ambiguous as to whether it referred to the function itself or each instantiation of the function. To make this less ambiguous the word object was added
